item.description:
There is no Red Sox game home or away on this day, so hopefully, Beerworks will be quiet.

But if anyone has any other suggestions for a venue, please let me know.

The group is really going well and I always try to make sure everyone has a good time.

More blueberry ale innkeeper!

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: August Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup
